cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to an invalid hex format '0xZZZ' will cause parsing errors and prevent gNB initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to 1000 (exceeds maximum allowed value of 275) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent cell setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為 1000（超過最大允許值 275）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止小區設定。
